title: sx的bug Health must be between 0 and 20.0
author: 梦落老司机
txt_content:
[SX-Attribute] Task #2078448 for SX-Attribute v2.0.2 generated an exception
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: Health must be between 0 and 20.0(19020.0)
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.entity.CraftLivingEntity.setHealth(CraftLivingEntity.java:97) ~[spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-dcd1643-e60fc34]
        at github.saukiya.sxattribute.data.attribute.sub.defence.HealthAttribute.eventMethod(HealthAttribute.java:43) ~[?:?]
        at github.saukiya.sxattribute.data.attribute.SXAttributeManager$1.run(SXAttributeManager.java:234) ~[?:?]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.scheduler.CraftTask.run(CraftTask.java:76) ~[spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-dcd1643-e60fc34]
        at org.bukkit.craftbukkit.v1_12_R1.scheduler.CraftScheduler.mainThreadHeartbeat(CraftScheduler.java:361) [spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-dcd1643-e60fc34]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.MinecraftServer.D(MinecraftServer.java:739) [spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-dcd1643-e60fc34]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.DedicatedServer.D(DedicatedServer.java:406) [spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-dcd1643-e60fc34]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.MinecraftServer.C(MinecraftServer.java:679) [spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-dcd1643-e60fc34]
        at net.minecraft.server.v1_12_R1.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:577) [spigot-1.12.2.jar:git-Spigot-dcd1643-e60fc34]
        at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) [?:?]
会造成严重卡顿

replies.author: pepsi小唐
replies.txt_content:
梦落老司机 发表于 2020-8-1 16:19
生物显血是哪个
#血量显示相关Health:  #是否启用头顶显血  NameVisible:    Enabled: true    # {0} - 生物当前血量    # {1} - 生物最大血量    #血条总长度    Size: 10    #当前血量每格显示的文本    Current: '[爱心]'    #已损血量每格显示文本    Loss: '&7[爱心]'    #显血前缀    Prefix: '&8[&c'    #显血后缀    Suffix: '&8] &7- &8[&c{0}&8]'    #停留时间(单位:s)    DisplayTime: 4

replies.author: 梦落老司机
replies.txt_content:
pepsi小唐 发表于 2020-8-1 14:18
具体是想问什么
怎么让他不报错

replies.author: pepsi小唐
replies.txt_content: 就是调高他的限制生命值？

replies.author: 梦落老司机
replies.txt_content:
pepsi小唐 发表于 2020-8-1 14:29
就是调高他的限制生命值？
怎么调高

replies.author: pepsi小唐
replies.txt_content:
梦落老司机 发表于 2020-8-1 14:39
怎么调高
HealthScaled:
  Enabled: true
  Value: 40

把那个true改成false就不会限制血量了

replies.author: 梦落老司机
replies.txt_content:
pepsi小唐 发表于 2020-8-1 14:57
HealthScaled:
  Enabled: true
  Value: 40
改了还是报错

replies.author: pepsi小唐
replies.txt_content: 你是不是改了生物显血

replies.author: 梦落老司机
replies.txt_content:
pepsi小唐 发表于 2020-8-1 15:28
你是不是改了生物显血
